Subcommittee on Energy and Government Processes. Approved for full committee consideration without amendment favorably.
Committee on Governmental Affairs. Ordered to be reported with amendments favorably.

Passed Senate with amendments by Voice Vote.
House Agreed to Senate Amendments by Unanimous Consent.

Presented to President.
Signed by President.
Became Public Law No: 99-544.

official_title: A bill to amend title 13, United States Code, to eliminate the requirement relating to decennial censuses of drainage.

summary.text: (Measure passed Senate, amended) Eliminates the requirement for decennial censuses of agricultural drainage.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 13, United States Code, to eliminate the requirement relating to decennial censuses of drainage.
